The True Fruit of Conversion. 2 Peter 1 gives the genuine work of sanctification. Read and understand this chapter. There is need that the 


                                     -341- 

grace of God be seen and realized in our influence in the religious life and character. "Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God, and Jesus our Lord." Then comes the true fruit of genuine conversion in living on the plan of addition. These precious, elevating principles are to be brought into our daily experience. The promises of God accepted in genuine faith have a fragrant influence upon the life and the character, making the human agent to reflect the image of the Divine.
